content: TE-Y JO Joint chisels Carbide-tipped SDS Max (TE-Y) joint chisels for removing mortar ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Chisels and rod drivers- - ### FEATURES:Features Carbide tip – for faster progress and longer-lasting chisels Upgraded breaking power – extra-tough connection end transfers more force from the tool to the chisel Better reliability – these joint chisels are made from high-alloy steel, essential when you need consistency and reliability Built for tough jobs – tested for extreme use, our mortar chisels are made to power through your most demanding joint preparation and tuck pointing work Applications Removing mortar between bricks/blockwork Tuck pointing Preparing mortar joints for caulking or seaming For use with SDS Max (TE-Y) electric jackhammers, breakers or rotary hammers ### TECHNICAL DATA: Connection end: TE-Y (SDS Max) Product Class: Premium Technical Data | Connection end | TE-Y (SDS Max) | Application | Mortar removal | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 2312430 - Joint chisel TE-YX JO 28 - Package Size 1 pc - 2429757 - Joint chisel TE-Y JO 28 - Package Size 1 pc
